name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and a rich tomato sauce.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Traditional Italian pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Beef Burger
description: Grilled beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and secret sauce.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with a savory sauce and served over rice.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken in a creamy, spicy tomato sauce served with rice or naan.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Grilled fish with cabbage slaw, avocado, and a tangy sauce in soft tortillas.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with saut√©ed mushrooms and a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, egg, and bean sprouts.

name: Apple Pie
description: Classic apple pie with a flaky crust and a hint of cinnamon, served with vanilla ice cream.
